ABOUT.TITLE: About
ABOUT.CONTENT2: Welcome visiting our website.We are located in Central Taiwan, specializing in the development of Saxophone & Toois trade and wholesalers, which is worthy of trust in the community.
ABOUT.CONTENT3: The company team originated from the development of metal processing and transformation of precision hand tools in 2012. A group of music-loving companies that love Saxophone's "Musical Instrument" is more rigorous in the process and surface treatment of the instrument tube and neck tube.
ABOUT.CONTENT4: In order to create the Bel Canto musical instrument, after joining Taichung Huli Musical Instrument Cultural Association, the team created a Saxophone brand with many production and sales owners, and established T-H Industrial Co., Ltd in October 2019. The production and marketing industry counseling has created a high-quality bel canto with the company name: Tong Hao "Jin Tong Gao", and has gone international.
ABOUT.CONTENT5: The Saxophone developed by our company is a brand for Taiwanese production, which should be supplied to domestic and foreign counterparts at the most reasonable price.
ABOUT.CONTENT6: If you are interested in our products, the owners are welcome to contact us to discuss high-quality customized products.
ABOUT.NAME: President - Peter Huang
